tickets.title: Page load timeout
tickets.description: Homepage takes too long to load.

tickets.title: Database connection error
tickets.description: Cannot connect to the database server.

tickets.title: UI alignment issue
tickets.description: Header alignment is off on mobile devices.

tickets.title: API response error
tickets.description: API returns error 500 for valid requests.

tickets.title: Email notifications not sent
tickets.description: Users do not receive email notifications.

tickets.title: Profile picture upload issue
tickets.description: Users unable to upload profile pictures.

tickets.title: Search functionality broken
tickets.description: Search does not return correct results.

tickets.title: Slow search results
tickets.description: Search results take too long to appear.

tickets.title: Crash on settings page
tickets.description: Settings page causes app to crash.

tickets.title: Data sync issue
tickets.description: Data does not sync across devices.
